content.rendered:
Any excuse for a celebration – Comic Relief was a perfect one!

Obviously the day included Red Noses all round and plenty of laughter. We played games all day with a surprising level of competitiveness from “Nearest the Pin” Putting. Blind food tasting was an interesting game. However, my favourite had to be “Play Your Cards Right” always loud and always a crowd pleaser!

excerpt.rendered: Any excuse for a celebration – Comic Relief was a perfect one!
